title: Time Time to Love Time for War Time to Heal
description: David Bebelaar is the eldest son of Walter (Wouter) Bebelaar. Walter and his mother were interned in Japanese Concentration camps in Sumatra during WWII. Walter's father Jacob (Jaap) was a POW of the Japanese and died working on the Burma railway. David has sought to honor the memory of his father and grandparents by telling their stories, through their letters, and has received a posthumous war medal for his grandfather. He has also assisted other families in acquiring posthumous war medals for their loved ones
author: David Bebelaar
